body_html:
@alex47 I guess that you are not using the right msbuild due to missing the following line in the tutorial.

# Open X86_64 Developer Command Prompt for MSVC 2017 and type in the following commands:

Since in that shell, the path of msbuild should be automatically included.
body:
@alex47 I guess that you are not using the right msbuild due to missing the following line in the tutorial.
```Powershell
# Open X86_64 Developer Command Prompt for MSVC 2017 and type in the following commands:
```
Since in that shell, the path of msbuild should be automatically included.
